name: Post Grid Free
author: Pickelements

sections.description:
Post Grid Free is a fully Responsive WordPress Plugin to display your WordPress post with different styles.

  • Live Demo
  • Need Support

Plugin Features

  • Modern & Creative Design.
  • Clean Code.
  • Seo Friendly.
  • Responsive Layouts.
  • Grid Title color Options.
  • Grid Title font size Options.
  • Grid Items Background color Options.
  • Display Number of Post Items.
  • Unlimited Grid Anywhere.
  • Easy Shortcode.
  • Touch & Swipe Enable.
  • No Coding Required.
  • Easy Documentation.
  • 24/7 dedicated support.
  • And much more!
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Plugins setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After activating the plugin just copy shortcode from shortcode page and paste anywhere in your post page or widgets sections to display post Grid.

Using FTP
1. Extract post-grid-free.zip to your computer.
2. Upload the post-grid-free directory to your wp-content/plugins directory.
3. After activating the plugin just copy shortcode from shortcode page and paste anywhere in your post page or widgets sections to display post Grid.

How to use short-code?
When plugin active & all setup done please copy shortcode from shortcode page and paste anywhere in your post page or widgets sections to display post Grid.
